name: Be witched or be dead
description:
< An Amstrad CPC game for two players >

#bewitchedobd

Face your rival and cast the craziest spells to decrease their strength. Move around the platforms, go up and down the stairs sidestepping your opponent's spells. But be careful! Magic can have unexpected effects. Things won't always go as you'd wished... Be witched or be dead!

  • 2 simultaneous player battle
  • 4 direction fire
  • 2 game modes available
  • 5 stages
  • 6 characters
  • 4 items to collect
  • Trap switch
HOW TO PLAY | CONTROLS
  • Use the numbers shown in the menu to navigate between screens
  • You can redefine both player controls, because there's nothing more pleasant than redefining your own keys...
  • Players can be controlled by joystick

Default keys:

PLAYER 1MovementPLAYER 21UP
F7QDOWNF4DLEFTF2FRIGHTF3ZSPELLF0 GESTURES

According to the CPCRetroDev rules, we included a gesture to Larcena's Legacy, CPCRetroDev's first edition winner. We included a playable character from the game.

LOAD INSTRUCTIONS

On a real Amstrad CPC:

  • TAPE
    Insert the tape into the cassette deck, reset your computer, type RUN" and press enter, press PLAY and then any key. The loading time is about 4 minutes.
  • DISK
    Insert the disk on the disk deck, reset yout computer, type RUN"disc and press enter.

On an emulator (Retro Virtual Machine recommended):

  • TAPE (CDT file)
    Run the CPC464 machine emulator, open the .CDT file, reset the machine, type RUN" and press enter, press PLAY and then any key. The loading time is about 4 minutes.
  • DISK (DSK file)
    Run the CPC6128 or CPC664 machine emulator, open the .DSK file on the emulator, reset the machine, type RUN"disc and press enter.
